this minut village in the interior of
Bankura district hidden in the
protection of dense foilage his
unapproachable by travelers during the

Auto to traverse these roads the Bullock

a sensation we created a group piloted

fastness invading the ancient privacy

found ourselves within a hundred feet of

road struggle crowned by a rough finish
we approached a large two-story building
of brick and plaster dominating the

it was a characteristically tropical

young and old barren dry
women aloof somewhat but inquisitive to

they gazed on this unprecedented

in typically Indian fashion she drew
forward modestly and hesitantly peering

like smoldering embers in the shadow of

approached and silently assented or
snapping a number of photos with our

years
treats a Newman of course has fasted

tone

Swift understanding your nourishment

Giri Bala put aside her a will

her voice was low and firm I was born in
these forest regions my childhood was
unremarkable save that I was possessed

often warned me try to control your
greed when the time comes for you to

eating the calamity she had foreseen

mother in law shamed me morning noon and
night about my gluttonous habits her

however they roused my dorm and
spiritual tendencies one morning her

long as I live my mother-in-law laughed
in derision
so she said how can you live without
eating when you cannot live without
overeating this remark was unanswerable
he had an iron resolution scalped in my
spirit in a secluded spot I sought my
heavenly father Lord I prayed
incessantly please send me a guru one

for you this vague answer was not the

got the Morning Sun pierced the waters i
